links.*: The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor

wikitext.*:
'''''lanka''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "sharp edge (not of tools), sudden end, as in e.g. a cliff-edge, or the clean edge of things made by hand or built".<ref name=VT>{{VT|42a}}, p. 8</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] (G)LAN ("rim, border, boundary, limit")<ref name=VT/>
==Cognates==
*[[Telerin]] ''[[lanca]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[lanc]]''
